dt: {bc}to lie or settle in sedimentary layers between other existing layers

dt.t: … consists of … sandstones of variable thickness that {wi}interbed{/wi} with grey and greenish shales.

utxt.t: The factory crushed shale extracted from the site, discarded the {wi}interbedded{/wi} limestone, and baked the clay into bricks.

shortdef: to lie or settle in sedimentary layers between other existing layers
